001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.io.PrintWriter;
004import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
005
006/** Bach's main program. */
007public record Main() implements ToolProvider {
008
009  /** The main entry-point. */
010  public static void main(String... args) {
011    var options = args.length == 0 ? Options.parse("--help") : Options.parse(args);
012    var out = new PrintWriter(System.out, true);
013    var err = new PrintWriter(System.err, true);
014    new Program(out, err, options).run();
015  }
016
017  @Override
018  public String name() {
019    return "bach";
020  }
021
022  @Override
023  public int run(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String... args) {
024    try {
025      new Program(out, err, Options.parse(args)).run();
026      return 0;
027    } catch (Exception exception) {
028      err.println(exception);
029      return 1;
030    }
031  }
032
033  record Program(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, Options options) {
034
035    public void run() {
036      if (options.forMain().help().orElse(false)) {
037        out.print("""
038        Usage: bach ...
039        """);
040        return;
041      }
042      if (options.forMain().version().orElse(false)) {
043        out.println(Bach.version());
044        return;
045      }
046      if (options.forMain().generateBuildProgram().orElse(false)) {
047        out.print(Bach.BuildProgramGenerators.generateConventionalBuildProgram());
048        return;
049      }
050      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("options = %s".formatted(options));
051    }
052  }
053}
